attributes.action: Occupy Oligarch properties with Ukrainian refugees
attributes.additional_details: Many properties in England are owned by Russian Putin connected Oligarchs - many of these are empty/occupied by staff; so why not seize them to house Ukrainian refugees - they will be empty if we just cease them
attributes.background: Encourage, facilitate the occupation of Oligarch/Putin connected homes in England with Ukrainian refugees

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418

Arrangements for housing refugees is an operational matter for the Home Office and individual local authorities.
